verses.verse: Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

"Speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and tell <WH559> them, <WH4150> 'The set feasts of Yahweh, <WH3068> which you shall proclaim <WH7121> to be holy <WH6944> convocations, <WH4744> even these are my set feasts. <WH4150>

<WH8337>"'Six days <WH3117> shall work <WH4399> be done: <WH6213> but on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> is a Sabbath <WH7676> of solemn rest, <WH7677> a holy <WH6944> convocation; <WH4744> you shall do <WH6213> no kind of work. <WH4399> It is a Sabbath <WH7676> to Yahweh <WH3068> in all your dwellings. <WH4186>
<WH4150>"'These are the set feasts of Yahweh, <WH3068> even holy <WH6944> convocations, <WH4744> which you shall proclaim <WH7121> in their appointed season. <WH4150>
In the first <WH7223> month, <WH2320> on the fourteenth <WH702> day of the month in the evening, <WH6153> is Yahweh <WH3068>'s Passover. <WH6453>

On the fifteenth <WH2568> day <WH3117> of the same month <WH2320> is the feast <WH2282> of unleavened bread <WH4682> to Yahweh. <WH3068> Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> you shall eat <WH398> unleavened bread. <WH4682>
In the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> you shall have a holy <WH6944> convocation. <WH4744> You shall do <WH6213> no regular <WH5656> work. <WH4399>

But you shall offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire <WH801> to Yahweh <WH3068> seven <WH7651> days. <WH3117> In the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> is a holy <WH6944> convocation: <WH4744> you shall do <WH6213> no regular <WH5656> work. <WH4399>'"
Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

"Speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and tell <WH559> them, <WH935> 'When you have come into the land <WH776> which I give <WH5414> to you, <WH7114> and shall reap its the harvest, <WH7105> then you shall bring <WH935> the sheaf <WH6016> of the first fruits <WH7225> of your harvest <WH7105> to the priest: <WH3548>

and he shall wave <WH5130> the sheaf <WH6016> before <WH6440> Yahweh, <WH3068> to be accepted <WH7522> for you. <WH4283> On the next day after the Sabbath <WH7676> the priest <WH3548> shall wave it. <WH5130>

On the day <WH3117> when you wave <WH5130> the sheaf, <WH6016> you shall offer <WH6213> a male lamb <WH3532> without blemish <WH8549> a <WH1121> year <WH8141> old for a burnt offering <WH5930> to Yahweh. <WH3068>

The meal offering <WH4503> with it shall be two <WH8147> tenth parts of an ephah <WH6241> of fine flour <WH5560> mingled <WH1101> with oil, <WH8081> an offering made by fire <WH801> to Yahweh <WH3068> for a pleasant <WH5207> aroma; <WH7381> and the drink offering <WH5262> with it shall be of wine, <WH3196> the fourth <WH7243> part of a hin. <WH1969>

You shall eat <WH398> neither bread, <WH3899> nor roasted grain, <WH7039> nor fresh grain, <WH7039> until this same <WH6106> day, <WH3117> until <WH5704> you have brought <WH935> the offering <WH7133> of your God. <WH430> This is a statute <WH2708> forever <WH5769> throughout your generations <WH1755> in all your dwellings. <WH4186>

<WH5608>"'You shall count from the next day <WH4283> after the Sabbath, <WH7676> from the day <WH4283> that you brought <WH935> the sheaf <WH6016> of the wave offering; <WH8573> seven <WH7651> Sabbaths <WH7676> shall be <WH1961> completed: <WH8549>

even to <WH5704> the next day <WH4283> after the seventh <WH7637> Sabbath <WH7676> you shall number <WH5608> fifty <WH2572> days; <WH3117> and you shall offer <WH7126> a new <WH2319> meal offering <WH4503> to Yahweh. <WH3068>

You shall bring out <WH935> of your habitations <WH4186> two <WH8147> loaves <WH3899> of bread for a wave <WH8573> offering made of two <WH8147> tenth parts of an ephah <WH6241> of fine flour. <WH5560> They shall be baked <WH644> with yeast, <WH2557> for first fruits <WH1061> to Yahweh. <WH3068>

You shall present <WH7126> with the bread <WH3899> seven <WH7651> lambs <WH3532> without blemish <WH8549> a year <WH8141> old, <WH259> one young <WH1241> bull, <WH6499> and two <WH8147> rams. <WH352> They shall be a burnt offering <WH5930> to Yahweh, <WH3068> with their meal offering, <WH5930> and their drink offerings, <WH5930> even an offering <WH4503> made by fire, <WH801> of a sweet <WH5207> aroma <WH7381> to Yahweh. <WH3068>

You shall offer <WH6213> one <WH259> male <WH8163> goat <WH5795> for a sin offering, <WH2403> and two <WH8147> male lambs <WH3532> a <WH1121> year <WH8141> old for a sacrifice <WH2077> of peace offerings. <WH8002>

The priest <WH3548> shall wave <WH5130> them with the bread <WH3899> of the first fruits <WH1061> for a wave offering <WH8573> before <WH6440> Yahweh, <WH3068> with the two <WH8147> lambs. <WH3532> They shall be holy <WH6944> to Yahweh <WH3068> for the priest. <WH3548>

You shall make proclamation <WH7121> on the same <WH6106> day: <WH3117> there shall be a holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744> to you; <WH6213> you shall do no regular <WH5656> work. <WH4399> This is a statute <WH2708> forever <WH5769> in all your dwellings <WH4186> throughout your generations. <WH1755>

<WH7114>"'When you reap the harvest <WH7105> of your land, <WH776> you shall not wholly <WH3615> reap <WH7114> into the corners <WH6285> of your field, <WH7704> neither shall you gather <WH3950> the gleanings <WH3951> of your harvest: <WH7105> you shall leave <WH5800> them for the poor, <WH6041> and for the foreigner. <WH1616> I am Yahweh <WH3068> your God. <WH430>'"
Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

"Speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> <WH7637> 'In the seventh month, <WH2320> on the first <WH259> day of the month, <WH2320> shall be a solemn rest <WH7677> to you, <WH2146> a memorial of blowing <WH8643> of trumpets, <WH6944> a holy convocation. <WH4744>
You shall do <WH6213> no regular <WH5656> work; <WH4399> and you shall offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire <WH801> to Yahweh. <WH3068>'"
Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

"However <WH389> on the tenth <WH6218> day of this seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320> is the day <WH3117> of atonement: <WH3725> it shall be a holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744> to you, <WH6031> and you shall afflict yourselves; <WH5315> and you shall offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire <WH801> to Yahweh. <WH3068>

You shall do <WH6213> no kind of work <WH4399> in that same <WH6106> day; <WH3117> for it is a day <WH3117> of atonement, <WH3725> to make atonement <WH3722> for you before <WH6440> Yahweh <WH3068> your God. <WH430>
For whoever <WH5315> it is who shall not deny <WH6031> himself in that same <WH6106> day; <WH3117> shall be cut off <WH3772> from his people. <WH5971>
Whoever <WH5315> it is who does <WH6213> any kind of work <WH4399> in that same <WH6106> day, <WH3117> that person <WH5315> I will destroy <WH6> from among <WH7130> his people. <WH5971>
You shall do <WH6213> no kind of work: <WH4399> it is a statute <WH2708> forever <WH5769> throughout your generations <WH1755> in all your dwellings. <WH4186>

It shall be a Sabbath <WH7676> of solemn rest <WH7677> for you, <WH6031> and you shall deny yourselves. <WH5315> In the ninth <WH8672> day of the month <WH2320> at evening, <WH6153> from evening <WH6153> to evening, <WH6153> you shall keep <WH7673> your Sabbath. <WH7676>"
Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

"Speak <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> and say, <WH559> <WH2568> 'On the fifteenth day <WH3117> of this seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320> is the feast <WH2282> of tents <WH5521> for seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> to Yahweh. <WH3068>
On the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> shall be a holy <WH6944> convocation: <WH4744> you shall do <WH6213> no regular <WH5656> work. <WH4399>

Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> you shall offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire <WH801> to Yahweh. <WH3068> On the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117> shall be a holy <WH6944> convocation <WH4744> to you; <WH7126> and you shall offer an offering made by fire <WH801> to Yahweh. <WH3068> It is a solemn assembly; <WH6116> you shall do <WH6213> no regular <WH5656> work. <WH4399>

<WH4150>"'These are the appointed feasts of Yahweh, <WH3068> which you shall proclaim <WH7121> to be holy <WH6944> convocations, <WH4744> to offer <WH7126> an offering made by fire <WH801> to Yahweh, <WH3068> a burnt offering, <WH5930> and a meal offering, <WH5930> a sacrifice, <WH2077> and drink offerings, <WH4503> each <WH1697> on its own <WH3117> day; <WH3117>

besides the Sabbaths <WH7676> of Yahweh, <WH3068> and besides your gifts, <WH4979> and besides all your vows, <WH5088> and besides all your freewill offerings, <WH5071> which you give <WH5414> to Yahweh. <WH3068>

<WH2568>"'So on the fifteenth day <WH3117> of the seventh <WH7637> month, <WH2320> when you have gathered <WH622> in the fruits <WH8393> of the land, <WH776> you shall keep <WH2287> the feast <WH2282> of Yahweh <WH3068> seven <WH7651> days: <WH3117> on the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> shall be a solemn rest, <WH7677> and on the eighth <WH8066> day <WH3117> shall be a solemn rest. <WH7677>

You shall take <WH3947> on the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> the fruit <WH6529> of goodly <WH1926> trees, <WH6086> branches <WH3709> of palm <WH8558> trees, <WH6057> and boughs of thick <WH5687> trees, <WH6086> and willows <WH6155> of the brook; <WH5158> and you shall rejoice <WH8055> before <WH6440> Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> seven <WH7651> days. <WH3117>

You shall keep <WH2287> it a feast <WH2282> to Yahweh <WH3068> seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> in the year: <WH8141> it is a statute <WH2708> forever <WH5769> throughout your generations; <WH1755> you shall keep <WH2287> it in the seventh <WH7637> month. <WH2320>
You shall dwell <WH3427> in booths <WH5521> seven <WH7651> days. <WH3117> All who are native-born <WH249> in Israel <WH3478> shall dwell <WH3427> in booths, <WH5521>

that your generations <WH1755> may know <WH3045> that I made the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> to dwell <WH3427> in booths, <WH5521> when I brought them out <WH3318> of the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714> I am Yahweh <WH3068> your God. <WH430>'"
Moses <WH4872> declared <WH1696> to the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> the appointed feasts <WH4150> of Yahweh. <WH3068>
